battlemeditationbasicpower.name: Battle Meditation Basic Power
battlemeditationbasicpower.description: The Force user directs allies in battle, making them more effective as a coordinated unit. The user may spend one force power point to add one automatic success to all checks made by a number of engaged friendly targets up to his Presence before the end of his next turn. If the user used a black pip, reduce each target’s Willpower by 1 (to a minimum of 1) until the end of the encounter

magnitude1.name: Magnitude
magnitude1.description: Spend a force power point to affect a number of additional targets equal to presence per rank of magnitude purchased.

range1.name: Range
range1.description: Spend a force power point to increase power’s range by a number of range bands equal to Range upgrades purchased.

control1.name: Control
control1.description: When making a Battle Meditation power check, the user may make an Easy (1 purple) Leadership check as part of the pool. If the user is able to activate the power and succeeds on the check, he may send simple orders as part of the power.

range2.name: Range

strength1.name: Strength
strength1.description: Spend two force power points to add one additional automatic success to affected characters checks.

duration1.name: Duration
duration1.description: Commit three force die to sustain the ongoing effects of the power on each affected target while it remains in range.

magnitude4.name: Magnitude
magnitude4.description: Spend a force power point to affect a number of additional targets equal to presence per rank of magnitude purchased.

control2.name: Control
control2.description: May suffer 4 strain to change the range of power and range upgrades to planetary scale.

mastery1.name: Mastery
mastery1.description: If no black force pips were used to generate one force power point, choose one skill. While affected by the power, each affected character counts as having the same number of ranks in the chosen skill as the affected character with the most ranks in the skill. If the user used any black force pips to generate force power points, each affected character must make an Easy (1 purple) Discipline check if he wishes to resist obeying orders.
